argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnngp | |- CCfld e. NrmGrp |
| 2 |  | #P_absabv | |- abs e. ( AbsVal ` CCfld ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnfldnm | |- abs = ( norm ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( AbsVal ` CCfld ) = ( AbsVal ` CCfld ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_isnrg | |- ( CCfld e. NrmRing <-> ( CCfld e. NrmGrp /\ abs e. ( AbsVal ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_mpbir2an | |- CCfld e. NrmRing |
